high_descs: Turn around from the picture, move toward the floor lamp, then turn right and move to the television, then turn left and move to the coffee table on the green rug.
Pick up the glass bowl on the coffee table closest to the television.
Move around the coffee table counterclockwise, past the table, and move to the floor lamp next to the couch and look up at the lampshade.
Turn on the floor lamp in between the couch and the door.
anns.task_desc: Examine a glass bowl using the light from a floor lamp.

high_descs: Go left, then turn around, then turn right and go toward the TV, then turn left to face the coffee table.
Pick up the nearest vase, on the table.
Turn left, then turn right at the dining table, then go straight, to the lamp.
anns.task_desc: View a vase by lamp light.

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the white coffee table
Grab the pot near the edge
Turn left and turn right, walk to the floor lamp
anns.task_desc: Grab the pot, turn on the floor lamp
